item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 17, 2024 at 1:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump rejects allies’ calls to tone down personal attacks on Harris
2. Revolut secures $45bn valuation in share sale by employees
3. [Opinion] Junior Isa rich kids are sitting on pots of gold
4. Singapore boosts ‘poisonous shrimp’ defence as US-China tensions rise
5. [Opinion] Ukraine’s incursion disrupts Putin’s war of attempted conquest
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, August 17, 2024 at 1:00 AM UTC
